description: Alex helps beginners discover the joy of music through hands-on guitar sessions. His friendly guidance makes learning chords, rhythm, and melody simple and enjoyable, even for complete newcomers.

Sara creates a warm and supportive space for learners to improve their spoken English. Her sessions focus on fluency, pronunciation, and confidence to help you express yourself naturally in any setting.

Rahim introduces you to the fundamentals of web development with clarity and enthusiasm. Learn to build your first responsive website using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript — guided by a passionate developer.
With Maya’s calm and compassionate approach, you’ll discover how yoga can bring peace and balance to your daily life. Each session combines gentle movement and mindfulness for complete relaxation.
David guides you through the art of photography with a creative eye. Learn to capture meaningful moments through expert instruction on lighting, composition, and storytelling through images.
Farhana brings the rich flavors of Bangladesh straight to your kitchen. Learn to cook traditional dishes like biryani, pitha, and bhuna khichuri with her patient instruction and cultural passion.
